@@ -1,1 +63,67 @@  # Let R = sqrtm(A)
  # By definition, A = RR
  # Take the differential: dA = d(RR) = RdR + dRR
  # Solve the resulting Sylvester equation for dR

comments.body: Note that all new code above here was previously within a `with ops.control_dependencies([grad_s, grad_u, grad_v])` block.  I don't see why those dependencies needed to be declared explicitly, but maybe I'm missing something?
I agree that these are probably not needed.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +284,288 @@    grad_a = math_ops.matmul(u, math_ops.matmul(grad_s_mat, v, adjoint_b=True))
    grad_a.set_shape(a_shape)
    return grad_a

  full_matrices = op.get_attr("full_matrices")

comments.body:
I kept it this way to preserve existing behavior; my pull request changes only the logic for the case when `compute_uv` is `True`.  However, I think you're right that it could be removed, and `v[..., :, :m]` could be replaced with `v` [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/17e725c0558581cba19bd6c409698b2c3f88efe5/tensorflow/python/ops/linalg_grad.py#L324) and [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/17e725c0558581cba19bd6c409698b2c3f88efe5/tensorflow/python/ops/linalg_grad.py#L328).

Would it make sense for me to make this change in a separate pull request, since it's not directly related to this one?  I can also just add it to this one if you prefer.
